page.title: 07The inside of my house
page.content: The inside of our house is not modern but the gadgets are. In the kitchen we have a gas hob, warming drawer, grill and oven. We also have a microwave oven, tumble dryer, washing machine, electric kettle, food mixer, fridge, freezer, wall can-opener and a pressure cooker. We have lots of cupboards and drawers. In the living room we have a video,tv, record player and gas fire.In my bedroom I also have a record player, clock-radio and a table lamp. In my brother's room he's got a radio and a lamp. In my mum and dad's room they also have a radio and alarm clock.All the gadgets are useful,but my mum thinks the microwave is the most useful because it saves her a lot of time.
